alert.note: Alert for Northwest Pinal County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 28 at 2:39PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Pinal County through 330 PM MST... At 239 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near La Palma, or 7 miles east of Casa Grande, moving northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Casa Grande, Coolidge, La Palma, Blackwater, Toltec, Arizola, Randolph and Coolidge Airport. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 187 and 204. AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 173 and 178. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 124 and 145. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
